meanings.sent1: The new material is manufacturable and can be easily turned into products.
meanings.sent2: The company specializes in creating manufacturable parts for various industries.
meanings.sent3: It was a challenge to find a manufacturable solution to the complex problem.
meanings.sent4: Her idea was as manufacturable as a well-oiled machine, smoothly coming to life.
meanings.sent5: The concept of sustainability is more impactful when paired with manufacturable practices.

meanings.definition: Suitable for production in a factory.
meanings.sent1: The design was carefully crafted to be manufacturable on a large scale.
meanings.sent2: The assembly line was optimized for manufacturable items to increase efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The comical mishap occurred when the robot mistook a toy for a manufacturable part.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity knew no bounds when it came to designing manufacturable products.
meanings.sent5: The blueprint had to be precise to ensure a manufacturable outcome in the factory setting.
